about_the_game:
Android Helipad is an arcade style flight game inspired by the classic 1992 game, "UGH!" In Android Helipad you play as android pilot Ellie in the future of 20XX. Your mission is to safely deliver passengers to their destinations while avoiding dangerous hazards. Will you be successful in this low poly adventure?

The full game features the following:

- 50 levels
- 5 different sectors
- 6 musical tracks
- Available on PC, Mac, and Linux
- Gamepad support

Mibongo Software is a solo independent video game studio. Android Helipad is my first game and it was a great project to do while learning all the different tools and methods of game development. Development on Android Helipad began November 2018 and I made an effort to use the most inexpensive tools while still being time efficient.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.3 GHz, Intel Xeon, Intel Pentium M, AMD Phenom, AMD Athelon 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8400 GS, ATI HD 3400
  • Storage: 513 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and onward
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400 3.1GHz, AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, ATI R9 390
  • Storage: 513 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.3 GHz, Intel Xeon, Intel Pentium M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8400 GS, ATI HD 3400
  • Storage: 564 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 and onward
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, ATI R9 390
  • Storage: 564 MB available space

name: Android Helipad

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.3 GHz, Intel Xeon, Intel Pentium M, AMD Phenom, AMD Athelon 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8400 GS, ATI HD 3400
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 510 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 and onward
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400 3.1GHz, AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, ATI R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 510 MB available space
